snippet.title: Madden 24 Superstar Deep Dive
snippet.description:
The Return of Superstar is here with The League and Showdown. 
Pre-order now: http://x.ea.com/77285 

New features like the NFL Combine, Mini Games and Real-Time Player Grading provide more ways to play and progress. Learn how you can play with your friends and dominate your way to the prestigious Madden 99 Club.

Superstar Showdown
Play with your friends and compete 3v3 with other superstars online in a new arena.

Superstar The League
Achieve greatness in your NFL career with your customizable avatar and progress from draft pick to 99 OVR as you build your legacy across a variety of positions.

Mini Games
Rushing Attack, Target Passing and all your favorite mini games returning to Madden 24 are more ways to play and progress your career inside Superstar Mode.

Real-Time Player Grading
Get immediate evaluations on the field every play that take all of your actions into account and let you know what you’re doing well and what you may need to practice.

Madden NFL 24 is available worldwide August 18, 2023

Read more about Superstar mode in #Madden24 x.ea.com/77282
